DOC.brief_summary: A phase 1 randomize , double blind single-dose study evaluate PK immunogenicity single SC 100 150 mg dos mavrilimumab healthy adult Japanese subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Double-blind , Placebo-controlled , Single-dose Study Evaluate PK , IM , Safety Japanese Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel group , single-dose study evaluate PK , immunogenicity , safety mavrilimumab dose 100 150 mg healthy adult Japanese subject . The study conduct one site Europe subject randomize 5:5:2 ratio 100 , 150mg mavrilimumab placebo .
